userStories.title: un able to kick off ralph from a ticket
userStories.description:
steps to reproduce:
- open a ticket
- click on the select dropdown to expose options
- click on "Start with Ralph"
- see that the terminal appear to attemptt o open up but then closes immediately

Expected behavior
terminal window opens up to the directory of the project related to the ticket with informatiom related to the prd on this ticket so ralph cna complete the single task when its being triggered from inside of a ticket

importnat note
when kick off ralph from a project, we do want raplh to make sure to only complete one task per terminal window at a time. but when kicking off ralph from a ticket, ralph will only complete that one ticket
